heading: Lord Zir Boss Guide
content: Welcome to the Boss Guide. Here you will find all the information to gather Boss Lair Keys, summon the Boss, and successfully defeat it. can be summoned within the Ancient's Seat in the Darkened Way. To challenge him, use the quick travel option by clicking the Darkened Way and then the Ancient's Seat, or travel there normally using the Pay attention to each of the attacks used by ! The following section guides you through the boss's most dangerous abilities. Initially, Lord Zir attacks you alone, but as the fight progresses, he is joined by vampiric minions. doesn't gain many new abilities over the course of the fight, it can become increasingly difficult to deal with him, the minions he summons, and the environmental effects. However, the presence of these minions means that you can proc on kill effects liberally to enhance your damage against the boss. During the encounter, you'll have to deal with bats, Vampire mages, Blood Seekers, and various environmental hazards. He'll summon a Blood Orb or Blood Seeker each time he loses around 20% health, and sometimes summons both at once. Before heading out, consider a quick stop at the Alchemist to pick up a to help counter his -based abilities. Each Boss has a different loot table of and cosmetic item(s), with a chance of dropping the highly sought-after items. How loot is distributed and rewarded has been changed with Season 8, and is now tied to using the Boss Lair Keys. To receive loot, you must use 12x to open the Hoard. The Hoard has 2 items in Torment 1, granting one extra for each Torment difficulty increase, and 2 extra for Torment 4. You are guaranteed one boss-specific when you open a Hoard. You can increase this by 1 for doing Torment 3 or higher, and another 1 for being in a party. While in a party, you have a 33% chance of getting 1 additional class-specific item per party member. New for Season 8 is the General Pool. On average, 50% of the non-guaranteed drops are now from the General pool, and the other 50% are boss-specific The items listed below have an increased chance of dropping from this Boss. You can still find items that aren't on the list, and you are not guaranteed to find a every time you kill the boss. Most endgame builds use one of these items. Thankfully, the Boss ladder encounters have a greater chance of dropping them. This means you can focus on any boss that drops regular items you are looking to obtain or upgrade while still having a chance at a You can unlock the following exclusive cosmetic reward when you defeat boss fight video guide. boss guide covers everything you need to know about where to go, and how to complete this encounter. Maintained by Reviewed by

content: pool, and the other 50% are boss-specific The items listed below have an increased chance of dropping from this Boss. You can still find items that aren't on the list, and you are not guaranteed to find a every time you kill the boss. Most endgame builds use one of these items. Thankfully, the Boss ladder encounters have a greater chance of dropping them. This means you can focus on any boss that drops regular items you are looking to obtain or upgrade while still having a chance at a You can unlock the following exclusive cosmetic reward when you defeat boss fight video guide. boss guide covers everything you need to know about where to go, and how to complete this encounter.
